dashboard.label: Air Metrics (DS)
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"chart_1":{"type":"viz.line","options":{"drilldown":"none","chart.nullValueMode":"connect","chart.showDataLabels":"none","fieldColors":"{"Avg":"#1e93c6"}","gridLinesX.showMajorLines":true,"axisY.abbreviation":"auto","legend.mode":"seriesCompare","fieldDashStyles":"{"Avg":"solid"}","displayView":"analytics_workspace"},"dataSources":{"primary":"search_1"},"title":"air.temperature","description":""},"chart_2":{"type":"viz.line","options":{"drilldown":"none","chart.nullValueMode":"connect","chart.showDataLabels":"none","fieldColors":"{"Avg":"#1e93c6"}","gridLinesX.showMajorLines":true,"axisY.abbreviation":"auto","legend.mode":"seriesCompare","fieldDashStyles":"{"Avg":"solid"}","displayView":"analytics_workspace"},"dataSources":{"primary":"search_2"},"title":"air.humidity","description":""},"chart_3":{"type":"viz.line","options":{"drilldown":"none","chart.nullValueMode":"connect","chart.showDataLabels":"none","fieldColors":"{"Avg":"#1e93c6","air.SDS_P1":"#1e93c6","air.SDS_P2":"#f2b827"}","gridLinesX.showMajorLines":true,"axisY.abbreviation":"auto","legend.mode":"seriesCompare","fieldDashStyles":"{"Avg":"solid","air.SDS_P1":"solid","air.SDS_P2":"solid"}","displayView":"analytics_workspace"},"dataSources":{"primary":"search_3"},"title":"air.SDS_P1, air.SDS_P2","description":""}},"dataSources":{"search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats max("air.temperature") prestats=true WHERE ("index"="air-metrics" OR "index"="mkr") span=5m
| timechart max("air.temperature") AS Temp span=5m
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}},"name":"Temp"},"search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats max("air.humidity") prestats=true WHERE ("index"="air-metrics" OR "index"="mkr") span=5m
| timechart max("air.humidity") AS Hum span=15m
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}},"name":"Hum"},"search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("air.SDS_P1") prestats=true WHERE "index"="air-metrics" span=5m
| timechart avg("air.SDS_P1") AS "air.SDS_P1" span=5m
| fields - _span*
| append [
| mstats avg("air.SDS_P2") prestats=true WHERE "index"="air-metrics" span=5m
| timechart avg("air.SDS_P2") AS "air.SDS_P2" span=5m
| fields - _span*
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}},"ds_8jT2DFBZ_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("air.humidity") prestats=true WHERE ("index"="air-metrics" OR "index"="mkr") span=5m
| timechart avg("air.humidity") AS Avg span=5m
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}}},"layout":{"type":"grid","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":750},"structure":[{"item":"chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":0,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_3","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":250,"w":1200,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_1"]},"title":"Air Metrics (DS)","description":"","inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"Time Range","options":{"token":"global_time_tok","defaultValue":"-24h,now"}}}}
